sources.title: Jazzmen | MUSICAL MOVIE
sources.description:
A musical comedy film about young jazz music enthusiasts from the 1920s. They dream of fame and go to Moscow, where they overcome many obstacles on the way to recognition.

Year of production: 1983

Directed by: Karen Shakhnazarov
Written by: Borodyansky Alexander, Shakhnazarov Karen
Composer: Kroll Anatoly
Operator: Shevtsik Vladimir
Production designer: Forostenko Konstantin

Cast: Evstigneev Evgeniy, Sklyar Igor, Pankratov-Cherny Alexander, Averyushkin Nikolay, Shcherbakov Peter, Tsyplakova Elena, Brondukov Borislav, Vasiliev Yuri, Dolina Larisa, Kuravlev Leonid

metadata.Plot: The details of this script will not be available until next year.
